Business Planning Analyst Hewlett Packard Global Soft September 2007  –  October 2011  (4 years 2 months) WFM Analyst IBM Global Services Pvt. Ltd April 2005  –  August 2007  (2 years 5 months) Designation: VCSC Support & SME for WFM. 
 
Job Responsibilities: 
Setting up single and multiskill accounts. 
Scheduling and forecasting the monthly data. 
Conducting periodic quality audits of employees working in the teams and implementing procedures to improve quality standards. 
Verifying reports sent by client on regular basis and co-coordinating the same with respective teams. 
Creating Holiday & Seasonal Forecast and creating Optimal Schedules. 
Reporting to the client / higher management about the progress and performance of the operation team on a regular basis. 
Attending conference calls for scheduling discussions with the client and higher management. 
Preparing staffing for the operation floor as per the calls predicted by the client. 
Handling schedules and staffing for IBM support to its clients. 
Creating Vacation Entitlements for the respective accounts. 
To cater various Internal and external customer's queries related to staffing through the IBM Web-sites and through e-mail 
Coordinating with the Team Leads in U.S and ensure smooth operation of the Helpdesk through daily Conference calls. 
Training the New Agents and the Managers by walking them through the eWFM. 
Additional Responsibilities: 
 
Training of new hires in the team. 
 
Training of agents/call-takers to explain the role of ASA Team in IBM. 
 
Identify improvement opportunities to take staffing and scheduling to the next level of effectiveness. 
 
Managing the access rights for different level for different tools.

Summary I am a keen and quick learner with 12 years of work experience in both back office and front office line of business. From last 7 years I am working in Workforce Management LOB.  
 
I am handling Accounts based of India, United States of America, Canada, Egypt, Costa Rica and Philippines. 
 
My job profile is :-  
Planning, Analyzing, Forecasting (Weekly, Monthly, Short Term and long Term), Scheduling, Staffing, Sizing for Single Account and Pool Account, Capacity planning, Service Analysis, Reporting (Dashboards, Aux usage, Shrinkage, Root cause Analysis, Daily report and Hourly report, Deep Dive Analysis Report), Maintaining Employee Database, Real Time monitoring, Real Time recommendation. 
 
Extra Initiative Taken: -  
Mentoring & Coaching Team, Training Operation Team and helping them in achieving different parameters, Creating process related Documents for Operation and Internal Team, Knowledge Transfer, Process Transitioning and Analysis, Projects, Creating Quick learning PowerPoint Presentation. 
 
WFM Tools = IEX, Avaya CMS, Aspect (eWFM version 7.2, 7.5 and 8), and different ticketing tools. 
 
To Develop my own Skills I have completed few Learning Courses:-  
Strategic management Planning, Communicating as a Leader, Essential Skills for Tomorrow's Manager Simulation, Difficult people at work place, Interpersonal Skills on fast track, Anticipating and solving problems as a project champion, Attitude and Engagement Certificate, Building your personal Brand, career Conversation, Communicate Etiquette, How can I improve client Satisfaction, Learning and career development, Managing and Engaging your new IBM employees, Project management, project management Orientation, Conflict management, Cloud Computing.
